name: Danaher tokenized stock (xStock)
description: Danaher xStock (DHRx) is a tracker certificate issued as Solana SPL and ERC-20 tokens. DHRx tracks the price of Danaher Corporation (the underlying). DHRx is designed to give eligible cryptocurrency market participants regulatory-compliant access to the stock price of Danaher Corporation, whilst maintaining the benefits of blockchain technology. Danaher Corporation is a global science and technology innovator operating in biotechnology, life sciences, and diagnostics. It focuses on accelerating the power of science and technology to improve human health.
